original_text: Which think to cause my people to forget my name by their dreams which they tell every man to his neighbour, as their fathers have forgotten my name for Baal.
korean_text: 그들이 서로 꿈 꾼 것을 말하니 그 생각인즉 그들의 조상들이 바알로 말미암아 내 이름을 잊어버린 것 같이 내 백성으로 내 이름을 잊게 하려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: Which think to cause my people to forget my name
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성이 내 이름을 잊게 하려고 생각하며

sentences.original_text: which they tell every man to his neighbour
as their fathers have forgotten my name
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들이 내 이름을 잊었던 것처럼
